title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 330.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 330.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the minimum conditions of confinement for
incarcerated individuals in protective custody within the department. Incarcerated
individuals in this status shall be housed in an area which will best maximize the
safety and security of both the incarcerated individuals and the
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
330.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 10, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 19, eff. 5/10/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
